mapper.select: select count(*) as value,stage as name from tbl_tran group by stage

select count(*) from tbl_tran t join tbl_user u on t.owner=u.id join tbl_customer co on t.customerId=co.id join tbl_contacts cs on t.contactsId=cs.id
u.name like '%' #{owner} '%'
and t.name like '%' #{name} '%'
and co.name like '%' #{customerId} '%'
and t.stage like '%' #{stage} '%'
and t.type like '%' #{type} '%'
and c.source like '%' #{source} '%'
and cs.fullname like '%' #{contactsId} '%'

select t.id, u.name as owner, t.name, co.name as customerId, t.stage, t.type, t.source, cs.fullname as contactsId from tbl_tran t join tbl_user u on t.owner=u.id join tbl_customer co on t.customerId=co.id join tbl_contacts cs on t.contactsId=cs.id
u.name like '%' #{owner} '%'
and t.name like '%' #{name} '%'
and co.name like '%' #{customerId} '%'
and t.stage like '%' #{stage} '%'
and t.type like '%' #{type} '%'
and c.source like '%' #{source} '%'
and cs.fullname like '%' #{contactsId} '%'
order by t.createTime desc limit #{skipCount},#{pageSize}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_tran( id, owner, money, name, expectedDate, customerId, stage, type, source, activityId, contactsId, createBy, createTime, description, contactSummary, nextContactTime ) values( #{id}, #{owner}, #{money}, #{name}, #{expectedDate}, #{customerId}, #{stage}, #{type}, #{source}, #{activityId}, #{contactsId}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{description}, #{contactSummary}, #{nextContactTime} )
